# $strDelReps

介绍

去掉字符串连续重复的字符

连续
$strDelRep('1233211234567'); //'1234567'

export function $strDelRep(v) {
  let obj = {},
    str = "",
    len = v.length;
  for (let i = 0; i < len; i++) {
    if (!obj[v[i]]) {
      str += v[i];
      obj[v[i]] = true;
    }
  }
  return str;
}
查看源码
